TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON func2(a) = func2(a2) AND REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|4)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($4, $9), REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|4)'))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func2($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|4)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[true]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a2) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncProjection
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2

LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[true]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinWithFuncInWhere
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a from MyTable INNER JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2 WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'val (2|3)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'val (2|3)')]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

Calc(select=[a]) +- Join(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[true]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'val (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func2(a2) AS f0], syncMode=[true]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON func1(a) = func1(a2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

Calc(select=[a, a2]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, a2, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func1(a2) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testLeftJoinWithFuncInWhere
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable LEFT JOIN MyTable2 ON a = a2 WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)')

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

Join(joinType=[LeftOuterJoin], where=[=(a, a2)], select=[a, a2], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[true]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testRightJoinWithFuncInOn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, a2 from MyTable RIGHT JOIN MyTable2 ON func1(a) = func1(a2)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], a2=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], a2=[$5], b2=[$6], c2=[$7], d2=[$8]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($4, $9)], joinType=[right]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a2=[$0], b2=[$1], c2=[$2], d2=[$3], $f4=[func1($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]])

Calc(select=[a, a2]) +- Join(joinType=[RightOuterJoin], where=[=($f4, $f40)], select=[a, $f4, a2, $f40], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) : +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func1(a) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f4]]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a2, func1(a2) AS $f4], syncMode=[true]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])

TestCase.name: testProjectCallInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT blah FROM (SELECT func2(a) as blah from MyTable) WHERE REGEXP(blah, 'string (2|3)')

LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP($0, _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalProject(blah=[func2($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

AsyncCalc(select=[func2(a) AS blah], syncMode=[false]) +- Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereConditionCallInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT blah FROM (select a as blah from MyTable WHERE REGEXP(func2(a), 'string (2|3)'))

LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(blah=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[REGEXP(func2($0), _UTF-16LE'string (2|3)')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]])

Calc(select=[a], where=[REGEXP(f0, 'string (2|3)')]) +- AsyncCalc(select=[a, func2(a) AS f0], syncMode=[false]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testWhereNotInSubquery
TestCase.Resource: SELECT func1(a) FROM MyTable where a not in (select a2 from MyTable2)

AsyncCalc(select=[func1(a) AS EXPR$0], syncMode=[true]) +- Join(joinType=[LeftAntiJoin], where=[OR(IS NULL(a), IS NULL(a2), =(a, a2))], select=[a], leftInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey], rightInputSpec=[NoUniqueKey]) :- Exchange(distribution=[single]) : +- Calc(select=[a]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c, d)]]], fields=[a, b, c, d]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- Calc(select=[a2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(a2, b2, c2, d2)]]], fields=[a2, b2, c2, d2])
